name: Erin Posey
text: Best place to take the kids, learn new skills, respect for animals and farm life. Horseback riding is an amazing, therapeutic experience and Elizabeth brings everything to life with her Equestrian knowledge!  I hope more people get to meet her and her beautiful horses!

name: William Crews
text: Great place to stay with your horse. The owners treat you like family and are good genuine folks. I’ll be back and will recommend it to those I know.

name: Sara Whitchurch
text: Best Horse Hotel/Motel in Alabama! The Mare and I felt like family! :)

name: Ann Russell
text:
Have been using this
Stockyard to buy and sell or cattle for over 20 years. Very clean and great place to take children also.  Family run business. Love it.

name: David Puckett
text: Another great sale. Have been doing business with this family for a long time.

name: matthew league
text: It is the best  place to buy goats and cattle

name: Scott Scheile
text: I always got the best service in the best price

name: Julian S.
text: Many, many cows and an auctioneer who speaks very quickly. Should be perfect if you need to buy or sell cattle. Locals report best hamburger steak you've ever had.
